Interface XASession

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XASessionImpl

    public interface XASession

    • Method Detail

      • getXAResource

        XAResource getXAResource()
                         throws JCSMPException
        Returns the XAResource for this session.
        Returns:
        The XAResource for this session.
        Throws:
        JCSMPException - If the XASession is closed.

      • createFlow

        FlowReceiver createFlow(XMLMessageListener listener,
                      ConsumerFlowProperties flowProps,
                      EndpointProperties endpointProps)
                        throws JCSMPException
        Creates a consumer flow within this XASession and associates it to this session.

        The semantics and error conditions of this call are identical to JCSMPSession.createFlow(XMLMessageListener, ConsumerFlowProperties, EndpointProperties)

        Throws:
        JCSMPException

      • createFlow

        FlowReceiver createFlow(XMLMessageListener listener,
                      ConsumerFlowProperties flowProps,
                      EndpointProperties endpointProps,
                      FlowEventHandler flowEventHandler)
                        throws JCSMPException
        Creates a consumer flow within this XASession and associates it to this session.

        The semantics and error conditions of this call are identical to JCSMPSession.createFlow(XMLMessageListener, ConsumerFlowProperties, EndpointProperties, FlowEventHandler)

        Throws:
        JCSMPException

      • createProducer

        XMLMessageProducer createProducer(ProducerFlowProperties fprop,
                                JCSMPStreamingPublishEventHandler callback)
                                  throws JCSMPException
        Creates a producer flow within this XASession and associates it to this session. A maximum of one (1) producer flow may be created per XASession. Only streaming producers are allowed, so callback must not be null.
        Parameters:
        fprop - The producer flow properties. Not used and should be null.
        callback - he event handler which has to implement the at least the interface JCSMPStreamingPublishEventHandler.
        Returns:
        a new producer with its own producer flow
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - If the peer capabilities do not support features requested in this operation.
        JCSMPException - On other errors.

      • createProducer

        XMLMessageProducer createProducer(ProducerFlowProperties fprop,
                                JCSMPStreamingPublishEventHandler streamCallback,
                                JCSMPProducerEventHandler eventCallback)
                                  throws JCSMPException
        Creates a producer flow within this XASession and associates it to this session. A maximum of one (1) producer flow may be created per XASession. Only streaming producers are allowed, so callback must not be null.
        Parameters:
        fprop - The producer flow properties. Not used and should be null.
        streamCallback - A stream event handler
        eventCallback - A producer event handler
        Returns:
        a new producer with its own producer flow
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - If the peer capabilities do not support features requested in this operation.
        JCSMPException - On other errors.

      • close

        void close()
           throws JCSMPException
        Closes the XASession. This call closes all subordinate guaranteed delivery flows (producers / consumers).
        Throws:
        JCSMPException
